programme.title: Os Abutres Têm Fome, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura desenfreada e anárquica que se desenrola no México do século XIX, o mercenário americano Hogan salva a freira Sara dos seus pretensos molestadores.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Shalako, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Shalako está conduzindo uma expedição de caça em uma zona selvagem no Novo México.

programme.title: Os Abutres Têm Fome, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura desenfreada e anárquica que se desenrola no México do século XIX, o mercenário americano Hogan salva a freira Sara dos seus pretensos molestadores.

programme.title: Da Terra Nascem os Homens, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Após a morte de seu marido, Martha e sua filha Hilary decidem seguir o sonho do falecido: popularizar a raça de touros Hereford no Oeste Americano. Elas leiloam seu touro premiado para um fazendeiro inglês no Texas e partem em viagem rumo ao Oeste.

programme.title: Exército de 5 Homens, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Durante a revolução mexicana, um misterioso homem conhecido como - Dutchman, chama três velhos amigos para uma missão perigosíssima, talvez...até mesmo suicida!

programme.title: Um Certo Capitão Lockhart, (2018, Western)
programme.desc: Will Lockhart chega a Coronado, no Novo México, procurando os responsáveis pela morte de seu irmão caçula, assassinado por Apaches incomumente armados com rifles.

programme.title: O Último Pôr do Sol, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: Belle Breckenridge e John Becheridge estão se preparando para uma jornada com o gado até o Texas, até que chega a casa deles o caubói Brendan O'Malley.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Crimes Obscuros, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: O policial Tadek investiga um caso de assassinato não resolvido e encontra semelhanças do crime em um livro do artista polonês Krystov Kozlow. Ele começa a investigar a vida do escritor e da sua namorada, uma mulher misteriosa que trabalha num sex club.

programme.title: Vou te Seguir na Escuridão, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma mulher deprimida com a morte dos pais se envolve com um homem encantador. Quando ele desaparece misteriosamente após entrar em um prédio mal assombrado, ela promete encontrá-lo mesmo que tenha que atravessar para o mundo do sobrenatural.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Após os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de água na Terra, uma nave é enviada até Titã, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a missão de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se vê isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles são forçados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espécies cada vez mais mortais de tubarão.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratório e está aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: Paciente Zero, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando os testes médicos são levados ao limite, os experimentos mais extremos terminam na ilha de St. Leonards, no Atlântico Norte - uma prisão destinada a alguns dos criminosos mais violentos do mundo.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: Pânico a Bordo, (2006, Horror)
programme.desc: Sob uma poderosa maldição maia, as cobras nascem dentro de uma jovem, devorando-a lentamente por dentro. Sua única chance de sobrevivência é um xamã poderoso que vive do outro lado da fronteira.

programme.title: Fada Dos Dentes, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: O conto de uma fada dos dentes mortal ganha vida e começa a aterrorizar uma pequena comunidade.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se vê isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles são forçados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espécies cada vez mais mortais de tubarão.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratório e está aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: Paciente Zero, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando os testes médicos são levados ao limite, os experimentos mais extremos terminam na ilha de St. Leonards, no Atlântico Norte - uma prisão destinada a alguns dos criminosos mais violentos do mundo.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei são os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a múmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha recupera seus poderes, derrota Jakotsu e se apressa para o Monte Hakurei. Renkotsu tem sentimentos rebeldes em relação ao Bankotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A barreira do Monte Hakurei desaparece e Inuyasha está preocupado com a Agome, que vai para o Monte com Kuga e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo e Sesshomaru sentiram que algo estranho aconteceu em diferentes locais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Batalha Decisiva! O Último e Mais Forte dos Guerreiros Zumbis

programme.title: Mirok e Sango veem um misterioso pedaço de carne nas profundezas do Monte Hakurei. Sesshomaru e Kikyo sentem algo estranho acontecendo em diferentes locais e seguem para o Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Poderosa Banryu; Duelo Mortal no Monte Hakurei

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrotá-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo vê Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Monte Hakurei é destruído e Kuga acaba caindo, mas Inuyasha o salva. Quando ele se encontra com Agome e os outros, que estão tentando escapar o mais rápido possível, ele vê uma ilusão de Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha é afastado de seus amigos quando é enganado por informações falsas de que Kikyo ainda está viva. Enquanto isso, Agome e os outros estão em uma certa cidade do castelo e são capturados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Escuridão do Coração de Agome

programme.title: O bebê de Narak guia Agome para um templo abandonado. Ele ordena que Kagura coloque um fragmento corrompido da Jóia nela, mas Agome recupera a consciência.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Na Era Antiga, Narak encontra um novo youkai para procurar os fragmentos da Jóia. Enquanto isso, Agome retorna aos dias atuais e descobre que sua escola está no meio da preparação para um festival cultural.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No dia do festival cultural, os youkais que Agome trouxe do Japão feudal são revividos. Eles devoram a comida que Yuka e os outros fizeram.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Invadem o Festival Cultural

programme.title: Um youkai é revivido e começa a roubar garotas e um jovem procura ajuda de Kaede. Inuyasha tem que derrotar esse novo youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Cinco irmãos raposas youkais acreditam que Shippo é um herói. Eles se tornam seus discípulos para aprender sua técnica especial, que na verdade é do Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se encontram com Shinosuke, que está procurando por sua noiva. Eles são agrupados em uma vila só de mulheres e são separados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Em uma aldeia onde vivem apenas mulheres, um youkai que foi selado em um pergaminho, é revivido.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Confissão Mais Perigosa de Mirok

programme.title: Uma mulher misteriosa aparece diante de Sesshomaru. Sara foi trazida de volta à vida e roubou a Tessaiga de Inuyasha e transformou Mirok e Sango em estátuas.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 1

programme.title: Sara pede a Sesshomaru que a destrua junto com o espírito, ele obedece e usa a Tessaiga para destruir Sara junto com o espírito.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 2

programme.title: Mushin, a pessoa que criou Mirok, vai morrer. Eles perguntam a Mushin o que ele quer para que eles possam lhe dar um último presente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Último Banquete do Mestre Mirok

programme.title: Um youkai invisível que rouba tesouros surgiu. Uma velha que não conseguiu derrotá-lo pede ajuda a Inuyasha e o grupo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Um ancestral de Hojo está em uma jornada para oferecer a herança da família Hojo, uma espada demoníaca. Inuyasha e seu grupo o acompanham.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Nome do Ancestral é Agome

programme.title: A lâmina de Ken traz desastre e Akitoki e Inuyasha viajam para o santuário para selar os poderes demoníacos da lâmina.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Sobrevivente em uma Terra Infestada por Youkais

programme.title: Hoshiyomi usa a lâmina Ken para roubar os poderes demoníacos da Tessaiga. Ele captura Agome e diz a Inuyasha para ir ao santuário dos deuses do vento e do trovão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Grande Duelo na Cascata Shoun

programme.title: Tsukiyomi, que deveria estar morto, possui Agome e aparece diante de Hoshiyomi.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O bebê de Narak está trazendo sacerdotes virtuosos perto da morte e perscrutando suas mentes. Ele está tentando investigar o local que liga os mundos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O bebê de Narak foi dividido em dois. Metade volta à vida na forma de uma criança vestida de branco.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kanta é uma criança youkai lontra. A cabeça de seu pai foi tomada por Hakudoshi e ele procura o corpo de seu pai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Viagem em Busca do Pai

programme.title: O local entre este mundo e o próximo, onde está o fragmento da Jóia, é o cemitério do pai de Inuyasha .
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e o grupo chegam na terra do fogo. Eles descobrem um portal gigante dentro de uma caverna nas montanhas.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Quando a passagem na Terra do Fogo se abriu, Agome sentiu a presença do fragmento da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Abi, A Incontrolável Manipuladora de Aves

programme.title: Quando Kaede ainda era criança, sua irmã mais velha Kikyo ficou responsável por proteger a Jóia de youkais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Trágica Canção de Amor do Destino: Parte 1

programme.title: Kikyou passou dias extenuantes lutando contra youkais, até que um dia, um meio-youkai chamado Inuyasha apareceu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Trágica Canção de Amor do Destino: Parte 2

programme.title: Para derrotar Narak, Kagura procura pelo Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome e os outros sentem a presença de Kikyo e de sua de sua flecha purificadora.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Luz que Guia ao Santo

programme.title: Quando a notícia do tesouro escondido de Polpo se espalha entre os membros da Passione, Bucciarati e seu bando partem para pegá-lo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Em busca da fortuna de Polpo!

programme.title: Com o desaparecimento misterioso da tripulação de Bucciarati no convés, Abbacchio lança seu Stand, Moody Jazz, para investigar esse preocupante fenômeno.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O bando descobre que sua chegada a Capri reserva um perigo. Com Giorno, Mista começa a neutralizar o inimigo com seu Stands, o Six Bullets.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mista é atraído para um caminhão em movimento. Nele, o Stand de Sale, Arts & Crafts, mostra sua habilidade de controlar as balas do Six Bullet.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Bucciarati entrega as joias de Polpo ao Chefe, Pericolo, e é promovido a caporegime da Passione.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Durante uma operação, Narancia é interceptado por Formaggio, membro do Time de Assassinos, que encolhe o capanga usando os poderes de Tiny Feet.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Narancia, cada vez menor, tenta se manter vivo enquanto Formaggio continua a pressioná-lo para descobrir o paradeiro da filha do chefe.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Bucciarati envia Giorno e seus homens para as ruínas de Pompeia, onde um confronto com Illuso prende Fugo em um mundo de espelhos sem seu Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Abbacchio tenta recuperar a chave para transferir a filha do chefe para um lugar seguro, mas antes ele precisa enfrentar Illuso no mundo dos espelhos.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Com ordens para embarcar em um trem com destino a Florença, a equipe de Bucciarati não conseguem descobrir como usar a chave, e os assassinos estão se aproximando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A equipe de Bucciarati está envelhecendo rápido por causa de um ataque desconhecido. Mista aparece para investigar, mas logo é surpreendido por um Stand Beach Boy.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Comovido com a determinação do agonizante Prosciutto em manter seu Stand Thankful Death ativado, Pesci decide enfrentar Bucciarati.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Merone usa o corpo de uma jovem para gerar um Stand e o envia atrás de Trish, que dá sinais de ser uma usuária de Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Babyhead tenta fazer picadinho de Giorno por meio da manipulação da matéria. Giorno revida usando os poderes de geração de vida do Golden Wind.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Giorno e Mista chegam a Veneza para recuperar o disquete, mas são impedidos pelo Stand White Ice de Ghiaccio, que congela tudo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Bucciarati acompanha Trish até a torre sineira para entregá-la ao pai finalmente, mas uma traição avassaladora põe em risco a vida dos dois.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ao perceber que foi enganado, Bucciarati decide derrotar seu chefe traidor e salvar Trish, mas o Emperor Crimson tem a vantagem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Considerados traidores da Passione, os membros da equipe de Bucciarati precisam decidir o que fazer, mas não será fácil fugir do chefe.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Squalo deixa Giorno fora de combate. Narancia usa a habilidade de radar de seu Stand Aerosmith para localizar e destruir a ameaça que se aproxima.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para investigar o passado do chefe, Bucciarati e sua equipe embarcam para a Sardenha, mas um estranho usuário de Stand aparece antes da decolagem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Sozinha na cabine e sob ataque, Trish recebe a ajuda repentina de uma entidade que se autodenomina Spicy Lady, seu próprio Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Em uma missão para localizar Trish na Sardenha a pedido do chefe, o leal subordinado Doppio encontra o traidor Risotto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Uma historinha do passado – "Meu Nome é Doppio"

programme.title: Ao perceber que Doppio é mais do que um simples membro de Passione, Risotto o ataca sistematicamente com a habilidade magnética de seu Stand, Metallic.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Decidido a identificar seu chefe, Abbacchio ativa seu Stand para revelar quem fotografou a mãe de Trish 15 anos antes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Sob um céu que pode desabar a qualquer momento

programme.title: Depois de receber uma informação anônima sobre a identidade do chefe e como derrotá-lo, Bucciarati e sua equipe vão a Roma encontrar a pessoa que fez a ligação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para fugir do Stand carnívoro de Cioccolata, Green Tea, Bucciarati e Mista tentam arrumar um carro, mas Secco está determinado a impedir a fuga.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Cioccolata tenta eliminar civis inocentes com seu Stand usando um helicóptero, mas Giorno e Mista decidem derrubá-lo antes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para impedir que Secco chegue ao Coliseu antes, Bucciarati o atrai para um duelo sob as ruas de Roma.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ferido demais para perceber quem o está ajudando, Bucciarati é levado ao Coliseu por Doppio, que revela sua verdadeira identidade à pessoa que o está esperando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando Emperor Crimson é disparado contra Polnareff, o Silver Chariot é perfurado pela flecha. Quem está dentro do Coliseu adormece de forma misteriosa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Com as almas trocadas entre si, Mista e os outros têm que dar um jeito de recuperar a flecha antes que Diavolo fique com ela.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando Requiem provoca mutação nas entidades ao seu redor, Giorno conclui que a alma de Diavolo deve estar possuindo um dos membros de sua equipe.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Apesar de seus esforços, a flecha cai nas mãos de Diavolo. Mas antes que o chefe possa perfurar seu próprio Stand com ela, Bucciarati intervém.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand de Giorno evolui para Golden Wind Requiem. Diavolo tenta anular seus ataques, mas uma nova e terrível realidade aguarda o chefe da máfia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Valhalla - A Lenda de Thor, (2019, Adventure)
programme.desc: As crianças vikings Røskva e Tjalfe embarcam em uma aventura para Valhalla com os deuses Thor e Loki. A vida em Asgard, no entanto, acaba sendo ameaçada pelo temido lobo Fenrir e pelos arqui-inimigos bárbaros dos deuses.

programme.title: Deus da guerra, (2017, Adventure)
programme.desc: Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitória contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exército chinês. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nação é mais uma vez atacada, Qi se vê obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: Ricardo Coração de Leão - A Rebelião, (2015, Adventure)
programme.desc: O ano é 1173. Inglaterra e França estão em guerra. O destino das duas grandes potências nunca esteve tão entrelaçado. A esposa do rei Henrique, a rainha Eleanor, e seus filhos estão agora do lado da França.

programme.title: D Artagnan O Quarto Mosqueteiro, (2022, Adventure)
programme.desc: A mando de seu pai, o jovem d’Artagnan viaja da Gasconha rural para Paris, onde se envolve em uma trama desonesta entre os mosqueteiros do rei e os guardas do cardeal Richelieu.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capitão da polícia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man é perseguido por um gângster vingativo, enquanto o exército japonês invade a região.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chinês, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie Chan faz o papel de um fugitivo do Japão que se torna um assassino para a máfia. O longa é focado na vida de imigrantes chineses que vivem no Japão.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na América, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Jet Li é Wong Fei-Hong, herói chinês que vai à América, é salvo por índios e luta contra a exploração de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: A Espada do Imortal, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Manji é um samurai altamente qualificado que torna-se amaldiçoado com a imortalidade após uma lendária batalha. Ele decide ajudar uma jovem que está movida pelo ódio e pela sede de vingança.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capitão da polícia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man é perseguido por um gângster vingativo, enquanto o exército japonês invade a região.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: The Barefoot Contessa, (1954, Romance)
programme.desc: A waning director revives his career after discovering a beautiful Spanish dancer and makes her into a Hollywood star. Ava Gardner, Humphrey Bogart and Edmond O’Brien star in this bitter tale of stardom won and wasted from Joseph L. Mankiewicz.

programme.title: The African Queen, (1951, Adventure)
programme.desc: A timeless tale of two mismatched strangers joining forces in a common cause - and finding love along the way. The story chronicles the burgeoning romance as they reluctantly join forces to torpedo a German gunboat in war-torn East Africa.

programme.title: Moby Dick, (1956, Action)
programme.desc: This stellar retelling of Melville's classic is unsurpassed in entertainment, imagination and high adventure. Consumed by an insane rage, Captain Ahab (Gregory Peck) has but one purpose in life - revenge on the great white whale who disfigured him.

programme.title: House On Haunted Hill, (1959, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

programme.title: The Fall Of The House Of Usher, (1960, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: When a beautiful young woman's suitor arrives to ask her hand in marriage, the doors of the mysterious house of Usher fling open...and terror begins.

programme.title: Tales of Terror, (1962, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: A trilogy of terror starring Vincent Price ('The Oblong Box') and featuring performances by Peter Lorre ('The Raven') and Basil Rathbone ('The Black Sleep'). Based on the works of Edgar Allan Poe and directed by the great Roger Corman.

programme.title: The Russians Are Coming, The Russians Are Coming, (1966, Comedy)
programme.desc: Alan Arkin and Jonathan Winters lead an all-star cast (Carl Reiner, Eva Marie Saint, Brian Keith, Theodore Bikel) in this outrageous comedy about a Russian submarine that runs aground off the New England coast.

programme.title: Shake Hands With the Devil, (1959, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Cagney stars in this action-packed tale of the struggle between the Irish Republican Army and the British Black and Tans, as an Irish-American medical student (Don Murray) takes up arms with the rebellion after losing his best friend!

programme.title: Odd Man Out, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Guns Akimbo, (2020, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: A guy relies on his newly acquired gladiator skills to save his ex-girlfriend from kidnappers.

programme.title: The Lair Of The White Worm, (1988, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious skull is unearthed, it’s stolen and used by its new owner to worship a pagan god who hungers for the taste of virginal flesh in this cheeky horror-comedy.

programme.title: Surf Nazis Must Die!, (1987, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: When the son of a gun-wielding woman is murdered by neo-Nazi surf punks in the post-apocalyptic future, his Mama hunts them down for some bloodthirsty revenge.

programme.title: Vampire's Kiss, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Teetering on the edge of sanity, volatile literary agent Peter Loew (Nicolas Cage) tries to find purpose in his life through a cutthroat work ethic and a hedonistic nightlife.

programme.title: Earth Girls Are Easy, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Three aliens (Jim Carrey, Damon Wayans, and Jeff Goldblum) crash-land in Los Angeles' San Fernando Valley. A manicurist (Geena Davis) and her boss (the wacky Julie Brown) befriend the threesome, give them makeovers and show them the town.

programme.title: Cujo, (1983, Horror)
programme.desc: While Donna and Vic Trenton struggle to save their rocky marriage, their son Tad befriends the loveable 200-lb St. Bernard who belongs to their mechanic.

programme.title: The Dead Zone, (1983, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.

programme.title: Secret Window, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Academy Award® nominee Johnny Depp (2003 Best Actor, Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl) gives his most riveting performance in this action/suspense thriller featuring a top-notch cast.

programme.title: The Dark Half, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A writer undergoes an operation that reveals a twin in his brain. He begins a double writing life, using a pseudonym for his disreputable best-sellers. When the pseudonym discovers he is to be eradicated, he goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: Stephen King's Thinner, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: An obese attorney accidentally runs down and kills an old gypsy woman. After her ancient father puts a curse on him, he starts losing weight, and cannot stop. Based on the Stephen King novel, written under the pseudonym Richard Bachman.

programme.title: The Dead Zone, (1983, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.

programme.title: Disturbing Behavior, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: When the Clark Family moves from Chicago to Cradle Bay, Steve is cautioned by Gavin Strick about the separating factions at the local high school, where the Blue Ribbons, a club of robotic perfect students, rule.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat is on in this fast-paced action-comedy starring Eddie Murphy as Axel Foley, a street smart Detroit cop tracking down his best friend's killer in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat's back on! And Eddie Murphy is cool as ever in this sizzling, smash-hit sequel to Beverly Hills Cop.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III, (1993, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Eddie's back! So are the laughs. Eddie Murphy returns as Detroit cop Axel Foley, getting down with the fun-and-sun set as never before in this revved up thrill-ride of a movie.

programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.desc: Steve Martin plays Reverend Jonas Nightengale, a slick-asoil flimflam man who'll trade salvation for a donation to his touring ministry. Jonas knows how to work a crowd and a con, but his works of wonder are done with mirrors and smoke.

programme.title: The Out-of-Towners (1999), (1998, Screwball)
programme.desc: A Neil Simon comedy that follows a couple's mishaps as they travel to New York for a job interview. A series of comedic disasters follow that might make one think twice before visiting the Big Apple.

programme.title: The Thing Called Love, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: In Nashville, there are 10,000 singer-songwriters chasing success... with one chance in a million of getting it. For Miranda "no relation to Elvis" Presley, that's one chance worth taking.

programme.title: Showdown at the Grand, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: A proud movie theater owner must defend his family business from corporate developers alongside a legendary action star as art imitates life in a showdown for the ages.

programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Be Cool, (2005, Screwball)
programme.desc: John Travolta is back as Chili Palmer in this sequel to "Be Cool." With an all-star cast that includes Uma Thurman and The Rock, "Be Cool" is the hilarious tale about a gangster-turned-music-mogul...and what it takes to be number one with a bullet!

programme.title: Blue Velvet, (1986, Thriller)
programme.desc: A sensual mystery thriller about strange happenings in a small North Carolina town. A college student stumbles across a bizarre mystery and wants to know more, perhaps too much more.

programme.title: Showdown at the Grand, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: A proud movie theater owner must defend his family business from corporate developers alongside a legendary action star as art imitates life in a showdown for the ages.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: The Green Hornet, (2011, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a slacker by day, party animal by night... until he finds a serious career that's seriously cool: crime-fighting action hero. As the Green Hornet, he teams up with gadget wiz and martial arts master Kato to take down LA's underworld.

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back, (2001, Screwball)
programme.desc: The comic "Bluntman and Chronic" is adapted for the big-screen by Hollywood without the permission of the real-life stoner icons of CLERKS— Jay and Silent Bob.

programme.title: Stripes, (1981, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bill Murray has joined the Army, and the Army will never be the same! When John Winger (Murray) loses his job, his car, his apartment and his girlfriend, all in one day, he decides he only has one option: volunteer for Uncle Sam.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Road Trip, (2000, Screwball)
programme.desc: Four friends take off on an 1800 mile road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a girl friend.

programme.desc: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: The Craft, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Sarah has always been different. So as the new girl at St. Benedict's Academy, she immediately falls in with the high school outsiders. But these girls won't settle for being powerless misfits.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Love And Bullets, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: The FBI sends a loner (Charles Bronson) to kidnap a mobster's mistress in Switzerland.

programme.title: North Dallas Forty, (1979, Comedy)
programme.desc: In a society in which major league sporting events have replaced Sunday worship as the religion of choice, North Dallas Forty appears like a desecration at the altar.

programme.title: Semi-Tough, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: Barbara Jane (Jill Clayburgh), Billy Clyde (Burt Reynolds) and Shake (Kris Kristofferson) have been best friends for years. But when Barbara Jane's new interest in Shake turns into love, Billy Clyde realizes she's the woman he’s wanted all along!

programme.title: The End, (1978, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: When Sonny (Burt Reynolds) is diagnosed with a fatal disease, he swallows a bottle of pills to end it all! Instead, he ends up in a loony bin beside the demented Marlon (Dom DeLuise) who is eager to help Sonny succeed...one madcap attempt at a time!

programme.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail, (1975, Best of British Humor)
programme.desc: Grossing the highest box-office of any British film in the US when released in 1975, this "cult classic" comedy from the Monty Python team loosely follows the legend of King Arthur, along with his squire and his Knights of the Round Table.

programme.title: Monty Python's Life of Brian, (1979, Best of British Humor)
programme.desc: A notorious religious satire, the film tells the story of Brian (Graham Chapman), a reluctant would-be messiah who rises to prominence as a result of a series of absurd and truly hilarious circumstances.

programme.title: The Bad News Bears, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: A major surprise as one of 1976's top-grossing films. THE BAD NEWS BEARS is a movie about children that is refreshing, utterly believable, and quite cleverly funny.

programme.title: Bad News Bears in Breaking Training, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story picks up the Bears career a year after their infamous second-place finish in the North Valley League. Faced with a chance to play the Houston Toros for a shot at the Japanese champs, they devise a way to get Texas to play at the famed Astrodome.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with… Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Priest Ohm silences Chopper with an attack from which few – if any – ever recover. Meanwhile, Luffy begins to notice something strange about his cave-like prison, and four fearsome warriors prepare for battle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: 0% survival rate! Chopper vs. Ohm, the sword wielding priest!

programme.title: Zoro, Gan Fall, Wyper, Ohm, and a prizefighting pooch gather for a ferocious free-for-all at the site of the Upper Ruins. While the battle rages, Luffy tries to punch his way out of the belly of a poisonous python!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Climb giant jack! Deadly combat in the upper ruins!

programme.title: Zoro and Wyper are out to beat down the same bad guys, but will they realize it soon enough to survive a white-barbed death match of doom? Deep in the belly of the python, Nami and Luffy enjoy what could be a short-lived reunion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of iron! White barbed death match!

programme.title: Eager to end their battle, Zoro aims the awesome destructive power of his 108 Caliber Phoenix at the sinister Priest Ohm! Elsewhere, god demands that Robin help him search for a legendary golden bell.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: God Eneru begins a deadly rampage aimed at exterminating the heavenly beings of Skypiea, and the ruins of Shandora become the scene of a bloody contest where survival is the name of the game.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Collapsing upper ruins! The quintet for the finale!

programme.title: Gan Fall, Wyper, Zoro, and Robin join forces for an attack on God Eneru. Despite their furious onslaught, the four warriors prove powerless to harm the thunderous deity until Wyper utilizes the power of a mystical stone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the ancient ruins! Sky god eneru's goal!

programme.title: God Eneru makes a shocking recovery from wounds that should have ended his reign of terror. Zoro and Wyper muster the strength for one final stand, and Nami must choose between her friends – and survival.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ambition toward the endless vearth! The ark maxim!

programme.title: Luffy emerges from his serpentine tomb with one thing on his mind: revenge! As the rubber-man sets out to settle the score with God Eneru, Conis rushes to warn her people of their impending doom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: They finally clash! Pirate luffy vs. God eneru!

programme.title: As the citizens of the sky run for their lives, Eneru issues in the dawn of Deathpiea! Luffy is determined to stop the madman, but first he must discover a way to lay hands on the heinous holy man!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A handful of gold sends Luffy hurtling towards his death, Sanji and Usopp mount a midair rescue mission, and Nami prepares for an electrifying showdown with God Eneru!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy falls! Eneru's judgement and nami's wish!

programme.title: Usopp arrives just in time to save Nami from a lethal thunderbolt, but even their combined powers are no match for Eneru. While they scramble for an escape route, Sanji stealthily searches for a way to sabotage god’s ark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The two awaken! On the front lines of the burning love rescue!

programme.title: Despite being slowed by an arm encased in gold, Luffy races up a giant beanstalk on a mission to settle the score with Eneru! Elsewhere, the people of Skypiea feel the jolt of god’s wrath!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Capriccio for despair! The impending doom of sky island!

programme.title: A flashback offers a glimpse at the lives of two legendary figures in Skypiea’s history: Montblanc Noland and the ferocious warrior Kalgara!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Led by a bell's sound! Tale of the great warrior and the explorer!

programme.title: The look back at the legend of Montblanc Noland and Kalgara the warrior continues with the story of how these two very different men suddenly found friendship – and then lost it just as quickly!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Free from the spell! The great warrior sheds tears!

programme.title: Montblanc Noland and the warrior Kalgara succeed in settling their difference before parting ways, but the laws of nature and man conspire to keep them apart – permanently!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eternal friends! The vowed bell echoes across the mighty seas!

programme.title: Eneru strikes Angel Island with a devastating lightning bolt, and Luffy continues his heroic climb up the giant beanstalk. The rubber-man refuses to stop until he rings the golden bell – no matter what the cost!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Angel island obliterated! The horror of the raigo's advent!

programme.title: While Eneru continues his thunderous barrage, Nami hatches a plan to give Luffy one more shot at a grudge match with god. Zoro’s at the center of the scheme, but he might not survive his mission!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Knock over giant jack! Last hope for escape!

programme.title: Nami’s quick thinking gets Luffy closer to god, and the Straw Hat captain launches himself into the center of a sinister storm! Can he find a way to destroy Eneru’s looming cloud of death?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Miracle on skypiea! The love song heard in the clouds!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Luffy’s epic battle with Eneru, sunny skies chase away the storms, and the cloud-dwelling citizens of Angel Island turn their attention to rebuilding their homeland.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The battle ends! Proud fantasia echoes far!

programme.title: Robin attempts to decipher the riddle of a mysterious poneglyph, Usopp barters with the locals, and Luffy raids the priceless treasures of the legendary city of gold!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I made it here! The yarn the poneglyphs spin!

programme.title: With a little help from their new friends – and a giant octopus – the Straw Hats bid farewell to Skypiea and begin their descent back to the deep blue sea. Where they’ll land is anyone’s guess!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Off to the blue sea! A heartfelt finale!

programme.title: After a frightening fall from the clouds, the Straw Hats find themselves trapped inside an impenetrable Marine stronghold. The crew gets separated, the Going Merry is impounded, and rumors of ghosts run rampant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A state of emergency is issued! A notorious pirate ship has infiltrated!

programme.title: While Nami searches for the Going Merry, Luffy and Sanji pose as famous chefs, only to end up competing in a cooking contest with a beautiful mistress of the galley!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji the cook! Proving his merit at the marine dining hall!

programme.title: Zoro is imprisoned and interrogated, and Chopper’s ill-chosen hiding spot lands him in the operating room along with a doctor who can’t stand the sight of blood!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy’s insatiable appetite betrays his true identity, and yet another member of his crew ends up in the brig when two Straw Hats try to fool Commander Jonathan with the same disguise!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The marine's dragnet closes in! The second member captured!

programme.title: Commander Jonathan sets a Straw Hat trap, but Luffy and Sanji are willing to risk it all to help spring their mates. Will a souvenir from the sky save the day – or will their escape plan be scuttled by foul play?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy and sanji's daring rescue mission!

programme.title: Luffy and his gang make a break for the docks, and Commander Jonathan deploys armed guards in an attempt to slow down the Straw Hats. Only one thing is certain: somebody is going down for the count!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the hot-blooded special forces! Battle on the bridge!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are surrounded, outnumbered, blasted with tear gas. Taking a pretty, young doctor hostage may be their only hope for surviving long enough for a Merry reunion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Breaking through the seige! The going merry is recovered!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew were almost in the clear when Nami made a horrifying discovery: the Marines stole their gold! Now, the Straw Hats must sail straight into the thick of the fight to reclaim their lost riches!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The pirate ship disappears! Fortress battle, round #2!

programme.title: Usopp hatches a plan for a moonlit raid on the Marine vault, but Commander Jonathan is has a nasty surprise waiting for the pirates! Meanwhile, Sanji and Nami attempt to recover the waver.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The gold and waver recovery operations!

programme.title: The extreme arrogance of a Marine special investigator clears a path for Luffy and company to make their escape! Unfortunately, the Straw Hats still have to find their gold before returning to the high seas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The one fell swoop plan! Jonathan's surefire secret tactic!

programme.title: The Straw Hats may think they’re in the clear, but Commander Jonathan has one final trap waiting to ground the Going Merry! If Luffy’s crew is to escape, they’ll need a helping hand – or eight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Farewell, marine fortress! The last battle for escape!

programme.title: Luffy and his mates survive and near-death encounter with some mischievous sea monkeys only to land on a mysterious island where everything is much longer than it should be!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Great adventure at long ring long land!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata is taken hostage from ICPO headquarters. The terrorists demand to swap him with their boss Napoleon XI, but ICPO refuses. Since Zenigata is no further use to them, the terrorists are bound to kill him; but Lupin is to the rescue?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Smith Gang hit-man company was once the best in the business, but they're suffering now from tough competition. Though the company chairman Smith considers running TV ads to revive his business, he can't think of a good way to do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though Joe Spade was once a formidable hitman of renown and Jigen's sharpshooter coach, he now comes to beg for Jigen's help; he had gotten old, flubbed a hit contract, and is now on the run.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: ICPO Bureau Chief Jasmine is an able commissioner. She uses the governor to spur Zenigata into action, as she has a secret plan to arrest Lupin. But Jasmine's plan is to make this mission her very last at ICPO so she could get married.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Nightlight Mask murdered the Duke of Le Mond and stole his diamonds. ICPO is having trouble solving the case, so they induct mystery author Conan Dorill as a special inspector. Dorill deduces that the true identity of Nightlight Mask is Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a night of thunder and rain, a man gives Lupin a doll. The next day there is a news report that a diamond called the Phoenix's Tear had been stolen. Lupin's been caught on security cameras, but he has no recollection of having done the deed.
programme.sub-title: When the Devil Calls to Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's target is the Vatican Crown, located at the North Pole. He devises a plan to thwart pesky Fujiko, which is to relocate penguins at the South Pole to the North Pole.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's North Pole, South Pole Adventures

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The World Crime Prevention Devices Association has developed the "killer safe" that sent many safe crackers to their graves. But Lupin takes the challenge to steal what it guards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin crashes crime boss Markane's masquerade party, but the party was just a ruse to entrap Lupin. Lupin gets hung by rope in the dark and is made the target of Markane's murder game in ten rounds, of which players have to hit the target.
programme.sub-title: The Badder A Guy, The More Villainous He Is

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew sneak into Peking's Imperial Palace Museum to steal Emperor Shi's jade Mahjong set, but winds up getting chased by a gang.
programme.sub-title: Operation INVADER at the Great Wall of China

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Foodie and gourmet aficionado Baron Gourmel says he wants to eat Lupin's brain. He claims he'd offer his own 70-million dollar jewelry collection to anyone who could capture Lupin. Fujiko hears of it and informs Lupin right away.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather Arsène Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are surrounded, as usual, as they are trying to escape after a jewelry theft. But somebody shoots at Zenigata and hits him dead on. Lupin learns of the even the next morning in the papers, and Fujiko and Goemon get implicated.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of the Duchy of Blanco has a one-of-a-kind gold coin of Hannibal hidden in his chest; well, Lupin and crew are after it. Amidst their scheming, Jigen is challenged to a duel with a man named Stoneman.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of France has run up a ridiculous tab with Maxim of Paris, and orders the Louvre Museum proprietor to sell a painting to cover his bill. But the proprietor doesn't want to let it go, and takes the painting out of the museum.
programme.sub-title: The Ultra Operation in the Train

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin recieves a letter about Marie Antoinette's jeweled crown, and sneaks into the palace of Versailles. A young man called Oscar appears, the sender of the letter.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin was told by Fujiko to steal a pistol of the Wilhem family worth 500 million pounds. Meanwhile, a man named Jim Benkei, a giant of a man who's stirred troubled in London, steals Jigen's favorite Magnum ...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the various jewels at the World Fair in Los Angeles. Lupin learns from Fujiko that a man named Harry Satler is also after the jewels, so he decides to go see who this guy is. The man he meets is a wizened old man…
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Pestered by Fujiko, Lupin has to steal a golden bed that was originally made by Louis XIV for Josephine. He makes a plan with Jigen and Goemon, but the owner of the bed, Morgan, is a formidable opponent who has WWII military experience.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Heike Clan and Minamoto Clan once battled on Devil's Head Island at the inland sea of Seto; Fujiko and Lupin go there to find out about the details behind the legend of the battle.
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of Demon's Head Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vivian dreams of becoming a star some day, but her auditions are a bust. She thinks of using Lupin to become famous; she makes Lupin engage in thievery, and informs reporters to be at the site to catch him in the act.
programme.sub-title: A Cat for You! Dried Bonito for Me!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette's Hope Diamond has brought much misfortune on its possessors. The diamond is now safeguarded by a maximum security device. Fujiko provokes Lupin to steal that diamond.
programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew go to a hot spring. Lupin and Jigen relax while Goemon trains at the cliffs. A girl manifests to Goemon and captures Goemon's heart. However, the girl is seeking the secret of his sword, for her swordsmith grandfather…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has to battle a hitman called Tiger. Lupin tries to dodge him, but Tiger is one step ahead of him. Lupin keeps trying to escape him but Tiger is relentless; he has a way of disappearing and appearing at will.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends go to have fun at the horse race track, but winning isn't as easy as stealing. Lupin notices two people who are winning big money hand over fist, and gets suspicious.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Catherine rescues Lupin and Jigen, who are pursued by Zenigata as usual. She's an old acquaintance of Jigen's, and provokes Jigen to steal a 140-karat diamond from her own mansion.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Wolf and Rose are a cool hitmen duo with the ambition of rising to the top of the hitman business by killing Lupin. They capture Goemon and torture him to confess about Lupin's weaknesses. Lupin learns that Goemon is in danger.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The painting "The First Supper" hides clues to an heirloom that Christ received from Virgin Mary. This painting has been kept by the clan of Judah for generations, and a woman named Nova knows where the painting is hidden.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the First Supper

programme.title: Hercules, (2014, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: The most towering myth of all time meets up with the mission of a real man in this action-adventure thriller that reveals the famed symbol of courage as he’s never been seen before: finding the hero’s heart that beats beneath his colossal image.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Ghost In The Shell, (1995, Anime)
programme.desc: 2029 – A female government cyber agent and the Internal Bureau of Investigations are hot on the trail of a "The Puppet Master" – a computer virus capable of invading cybernetic brains and altering its victim’s memory.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Oklahoma!, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Along Came Jones, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper gives a marvelous, tongue-in-cheek performance as a fumble-fingered cowpoke who is mistaken for a notorious bandit and almost gets killed by both sides of the law...all while managing to capture the attention of Loretta Young.

programme.title: Man of the West, (1958, Drama)
programme.desc: Screen legend Gary Cooper demonstrates why he will always be remembered as one of the most authentic stars of the screen. Capable yet vulnerable, Cooper's portrayal of a former outlaw whose past returns to haunt him ranks among his very best.

programme.title: Warlock, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: An ex-outlaw (Richard Widmark) divides and challenges a quick-draw lawman (Henry Fonda) and his sidekick (Anthony Quinn).

programme.title: Pardners, (1956, Comedy)
programme.desc: A rich momma's boy returns west with the son of his murdered father's partner to foil a gang trying to gain control of his family ranch. They accidentally clean up the town.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Drama)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Old School, (2003, Screwball)
programme.desc: Three men are disenchanted with life and try to recapture their college days.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: Secret Window, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Academy Award® nominee Johnny Depp (2003 Best Actor, Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl) gives his most riveting performance in this action/suspense thriller featuring a top-notch cast.

programme.title: Punch-Drunk Love, (2002, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Barry Egan (Adam Sandler) is a small business owner with seven sisters whose abuse has kept him alone and unable to fall in love. When a harmonium and a mysterious woman (Emily Watson) enter his life, his romantic journey begins.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Into the Blue, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Young vacationers, expecting to have a memorable time diving, find themselves in deep trouble with a druglord when they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
